span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 粗心的，马虎的： marked by carelessness or indifference to exactness, precision, and accuracy
【例】 a slipshod piece of research 一项随意的研究‖The hotel had always been run in a slipshod way. 酒店总是在以一种随意的状态运营。
【近】 botchy, careless, messy, slapdash, sloppy, slovenly, untidy
【反】 fastidious, meticulous 极仔细的；accurate, exact, precise 准确的
【记】 slipper拖鞋 + shod(shoe 的过去时)，总是穿着拖鞋的
